test-case.name: Given the admin user is on the Tool Builder admin page
test-case.title: Given the admin user is on the Tool Builder admin page

test-case.name: And a tool definition called "My New Tool Type" exists
test-case.title: And a tool definition called "My New Tool Type" exists

test-case.name: When she chooses to create a new tool definition
test-case.title: When she chooses to create a new tool definition

test-case.name: And she provides the tool definition name as "My New Tool Type"
test-case.title: And she provides the tool definition name as "My New Tool Type"

test-case.name: Then an error message with text "Tool Definition called "My New Tool Type" already exists" is shown for the new tool definition
test-case.title: Then an error message with text "Tool Definition called "My New Tool Type" already exists" is shown for the new tool definition

test-case.name: And she provides the tool definition name as "My New Tool Type 2"
test-case.title: And she provides the tool definition name as "My New Tool Type 2"

test-case.name: And she adds in position 1 a step of type MOCK
test-case.title: And she adds in position 1 a step of type MOCK

test-case.name: And she adds in position 2 a step of type MOCK
test-case.title: And she adds in position 2 a step of type MOCK

test-case.name: And she returns to the Tool Definition admin page
test-case.title: And she returns to the Tool Definition admin page
